1.content:
It was early afternoon in an idyllic neighborhood. The weather was warm, with just enough wind to make it pleasant. Except that something is strange about today: somebody, or perhaps multiple somebodies, is going to have an experience with age regression.

How does it happen?
1.title: It Begins

11.content:
Dr. Augustus was a curious scientist, in either definition of the word. He was indeed strange, and indeed had a curiousity about the world. He was especially interested in the way humans aged, and wished to somehow control this process.

A couple years ago, he got his wish. After striking his head on what he regarded as a particularly stupidly-placed wall, he had an epiphany. He understood how he could construct a device to manipulate the ages of living creatures. Taking two years off his job at a pharmaceuticals company, he ferverishly worked on this device, and now he had completed it.

It was a monstrously bulky contraption, full of exposed wires and mysterious blinking lights. It had a range of controls, which only Augustus knew did exactly what. Augustus walked out of his garage, eager to test this device on someone. He would have volunteered himself, but he didn't completely trust this device yet.

Who does he pick for his first subject?
11.title: Enter Augustus

112.content:
Marcus sauntered down the street, feeling on top of the world. At twenty, he was quite attractive, featuring a well-proportioned face, muscled body, and a luxurious tan. He was wearing a faded pair of jeans, a tight-fitting white shirt, and a pair of sunglasses he thought made him look rather sharp. He knew he was irresistable, he saw the hot college girl checking him out as he passed by her on the sidewalk. Unfortunately for her, his affections belonged to another. But that isn't important right now.

Running his hands through his thick, windswept hair, Marcus moved his hand down to check on his stubble. He had been trying to grow it out to achieve a certain look, and was a little agitated to note that it hadn't thickened at all today. On top of that, his shirt didn't seem to be pressing up against his pectorals as much as he was used to. He straightened the shirt out a bit, hoping that would fix it.

What Marcus didn't notice while he was busy fooling with his shirt was that his stubble was not growing like he hoped, but fading away. It vanished almost completely in the course of a few moment's walk, leaving a faint fuzz on his lip and chin. He also didn't notice his clothing growing looser as he waltzed down the street.

"Grr..." Marcus growled as he lifted up his pants. They had begun to slip down as he walked, which was unusual. As he looked down to see what the problem was, his glasses slipped down the bridge of his nose. He angrily shoved them back up, and continued walking.

Marcus's shirt was in no way tight-fitting now, as all the muscles that used to inhabit it had shrunken to their sixteen-year-old size. His pants continued to slip down his legs, and his sunglasses also had difficulty finding purchase on his rapidly dematuring face.

"Wha..." Marcus said, observing the slackened nature of his shirt. He went to feel the shirt, and finally noticed his thinned physique. He snapped his gaze down so fast his glasses were flung off his face, but he caught them before they hit the ground. What he saw frightened him. He saw a shirt, moments ago tight-fitting on his muscular frame, hanging sadly on his skinny fourteen-year-old frame.

Marcus yelped, his voice slipping to a high pitch at the end of the yelp. He had shortened noticeably by now, the legs of his pants were bunched up at his feet. Having been sliding down his legs for a few moments, Marcus's pants finally fell completely off, revealing smooth shins. Alarmed, Marcus tried to back up, as if that would save him from this horror. He only succeeded in completely stepping out of his too-large sandals, losing his balance and falling on his behind.

Continuing to youthen, Marcus quickly slipped past puberty while sitting on the ground, shocked. His limbs thinned, his face regained a boyish appearance, leaving him a skinny little kid sitting on the sidewalk pathetically.

But the process wasn't yet finished. He shrunk even more, heading into early gradeschool years. His cheeks fattened, leaving him a truly childish look. His overlarge shirt washed over him, becoming like a giant tent over his youthful frame.

Soon it was over. Marcus was left a child, five years old at most, sitting on his old shirt like a picnic blanket, wearing only the swimming trunks he had underneath his pants. He stood up unsteadily, holding his shorts (which now fit him like pants). Looking around unsurely, he soon took off running, crying at a childish pitch.

Dr. Augustus looked at the weeping child, who had a minute ago been a confident young man. He then looked to the bulky device in his hands and smiled. He would have fun with this later, but first the child...

Where does little Marcus run?
112.title: Marcus: Experiment One

1122.content:
No one took much notice of the bare-foot little boy with the baggy pants as he ran down the street as if his life depended upon it. "High-spirits" they said to themselves, chuckling at the cute kid before continuing on their way. Only Dr. Augustus knew the truth, and he certainly wasn't going to point out that the lad's pants were so baggy he had to hold them up.

His vision blurred with tears of humiliation, and unused to the new perspective with which he now viewed the world, little Marcus very nearly crashed into several people. Augustus, keen to observe his little experiment, followed at a casual pace - how far could a lost little boy get? Marcus didn't care if you got anywhere, he merely pounded down the side-walk with yelps of despair. His little sprint came to an end, however, as he attempted to dash around the corner at the end of the street. His small body slammed hard into a massive, seemingly immovable object, and he fell hard onto his rear.

"Ah, hey...careful there, little guy!" The dark-haired young man exclaimed, reaching down to help the sniffling Marcus up onto his shaky feet. In the fall, Marcus's hands had jerked out of their grip on his shorts, and as he was pulled up his shorts stayed down. He was so preoccupied with rubbing his stinging backside he hardly noticed he was totally exposed before this stranger, and the fact his eyes were instinctively filling with tears didn't help.

"Aw, don't cry!" said the stranger gently, trying to sooth the little boy. The fact that the child appeared to be very inadequately clothed raised a few red flags in the teen's mind, but he didn't like seeing a kid distressed. He gingerly pulled the shorts up from Marcus' ankles, first checking to make sure no one was watching; he didn't want to be accused of some kind of molestation.

"Shh, shh..." he intoned, trying to figure out why the kid was running around without his parents and wearing a pair of shorts that came up past his belly-button. As if to solve the problem, Marcus reached to clutch a hold of the excess fabric, holding the shorts up for himself - they still drooped down past his knees. He gave a pronounced sniffle, rubbing his eyes clumsily with his free hand in an attempt to stifle the sobs. Looking up - way up - at this giant stranger, Marcus's eyes widened through his tears, and his mouth dropped open,

"T..Tom?" Marcus stammered, before he realised what he was saying. The teen arched an eye-brow, staring down at the child before him with suspicison.

"Hey...how do you know my name, kid?" He quickly cast a look around again, wondering if this was some kind of set-up.

"I...I..." spluttered Marcus, really not wanting to admit to this guy, one of his work colleagues, that he had been turned into a little boy and managed to forget his clothes. "MOMMY!" he bawled at the top of his little lungs.

"Hey, hey, take it easy!" hissed Tom, reaching out to clamp a hand over Marcus's mouth. A second later he realised what he was doing and jerked his hand away, stepping backward. "Who are you?" he demanded, sternly. Marcus just stood there, staring at Tom like a rabbit caught in headlights, panting a little from his outburst.

Thankfully, only one person had been on hand to witness this scene - a certain Dr. Augustus. Watching the interactions intently, the scientist felt that it would be beneficial to experiment a little more with the unwieldy device in his hands - test the parameters, so to speak. Aiming it at the pair, he pressed a different button:
1122.title: Observing the Effect

11221.content:
A faint glow enveloped the young man and the young boy, and, in their heightened state of suspicion, both of them noticed it.

"Who are you?" demanded Tom once more, with a greater force. Marcus just stood whimpering, fighting back the urge to break down into childish wailing.

"Answer me!" Tom bellowed. Marcus's lower lip wobbled dangerously, indicating an imminent tantrum. Tom sighed, taking his intent gaze of the poor little guy as his mind raced to think off a way to avert that eventuality.

"Look," Tom said softly, smiling a little. "Why don't you tell me your name, and maybe we can find your mommy, okay...?" Marcus's lip was still trembling, although he forced his lips into a little pout.

"...my mommy said I had to meet her," he finally piped up, wondering if he could trick Tom into leaving him alone.

"Yeah, little guy?" Tom said, reaching up to rub his chin; and odd sensation was buzzing through his face, like pins and needles, which he put it down to the fearful adrenaline rush invoked by this situation. Strangely, something actually felt physically wrong with his chin as his hand brushed over it - the stubble that usually covered it felt wrong, somehow, sort of...finer. Softer. It irritated Tom, and he wrenched his hand away to focus on the situation.

"Okay then, where did you mommy say you had to meet her?" Marcus churned internally, just wanting Tom to scram. However, he also felt strangely nauseaous...kind of like the feeling he had experienced a short while before. The realisation hit him like a brick - he must be getting younger again!

"...NO!" he suddenly screamed, pushing at Tom's leg and darting past him at an impressive pace.

"Hey!" yelled Tom, turning to jog after him, but as he did so he realised more than just his facial hair was different - his whole body was tingling now, and looking down at himself he saw some odd changes. His usually tight-fitting T-shirt hung loosely across his chest, and his black cargo-shorts felt strangely loose. His feet no longer felt snug in his boots - his heels no longer felt the usual pressure, and his toes seemed to have a great deal more freedom.

"Come back!" he called after the fleeing child, reaching up to feel his chin again - the hairs, now soft and fine had also become sparser, and shorter. In fact, his chin was largely devoid of hair, as if he had shaved it perfectly, and only the area below his nose felt vaguely mature.

Marcus, on the other hand, was experiencing some very different changes. As he ran, on thin little legs, a strange feeling overtook him - each step seemed more powerful, each stride longer. The posters on the wall he was passing were also moving more and more into his line of vision. He pounded on still, although he was rapidly becoming aware that he wasn't growing younger - he was growing older. He clutched tightly to his shorts as he slowed to a jog, panting. Looking down at himself he saw that he was holding his shorts up above his belly-button, but they now hung to knee-level, not below. A wave of excited relief ran through him as he realised he was regaining his maturity. His body proportions rapidly changed as he approached puberty once more, his shorts finally able to hang - although still loosely - on his hips with no support. His chubby limbs became firmer and longer, his feet becoming thinner and longer as they crept outward as he watched.

Marcus had slowed to a walk as he watched the changes, and finally ground to a halt to watch with joy as he reclaimed his age. Suddenly, he remembered Tom, and span around to see if he had kept up. His joy turned into a mixed fear as he surveyed the scene in front of him.

"Wait, kid!" screeched Tom, his voice cracking horribly. He looked like a young-teen now, no longer the well-built stranger Marcus had slammed into minutes before. The sleeves of his T-shirt were past his elbows, no longer tight-fitting and visibly sagging beneath his arms. Beneath his shirt Tom felt more changes taking place - his chest was collapsing into itself, the hair that covered it sinking back into his skin and disappearing as he grew younger and younger. The hair beneath his armpits likewise retracted, as did the hair on his shins - shins that were gradually being obscured by shorts that sank ever lower. His shoulders narrowed and his arms became scrawny as he was dragged back across the threshold of puberty, becoming just a 10-year-old boy. His facial hair was no more; a smooth-cheeked wild-eyed youth stared in absolute horror at Marcus.

"M...marcus?" Tom squeaked, finally, recognising his colleague...and forced to look up at him. By now, Marcus had just re-entered puberty, hair sprouting across his whole body. His torso expanded, returning his lost muscles and masculinity. His shorts now sat properly on his waist, and his face had recaptured its fine, manly features. He looked down at the rapidly regressing Tom, torn between grinning and looking concerned.

"Yeah...that's right, Tom," Marcus said softly, as Tom's regression gradually slowed. His shorts lost all hold on his diminished waist, sliding down to sit atop his boots. Tom stared down at them, his mind reeling. He hastily stepped out of the shorts, as if he had the idea that is clothes were the cause of his regression. He stumbled out of his adult boots, his bare-feet slamming down on the hot concrete. His boxer shorts slithered down his smooth legs - he watched them in terror. His whole life, his masculinity, his very worth was all just slithering from his body. He was now just five-years old, his shirt reaching down to his knees and covering the palms of his hands. He crouched down, clutching desperately at his boxers.

"Help me!" he pleaded, staring up Marcus with impossibly large eyes set beneath a mop of light-brown hair and above the cutest little button nose. Marcus stared back with sharp features, a blank face and lips slightly parted.
11221.title: Tom: Experiment Two

choices: The scientist returns Tom to his adult state.
The scientist regresses Mark again by mistake, and Tom panicks.
112211.content:
Shocked and humiliated from a sudden return to kindergarten age, confused by the sheer impossibility of the situation and terrified of what Marcus might do to him now, Tom just sunk into his clothes with growing tears in his eyes and cried, "Help me!"

At first it looked like Marcus would just shake his head, steal the clothes and walk off... or worse, that he might humiliate him further. But as young Tom sat lying in a massive pile of his own clothes, helpless as his immaculate five-year-old body suggested and waiting for his fate to be decided, Marcus said, "All right."

* * *

Standing at a safe range, Dr. Augustus watched as Mark extended a hand in Tom's support. Neither of them were aware of why this had happened or whether or not it would stop, yet Mark's courage was admirable. The last thing the scientist would have done in his place would be to HELP the seemingly infectious victim of an age regression, not knowing whether or not he'd end up in the same state again. Maybe it was time for a little leniency.

But as he primed the device, both males rounded the next corner... out of range.

* * *

Tom had a hand clutched to Mark's as though his life depended on it, while the other held up the massive T-shirt. Mark himself had slipped into Tom's underwear... not a pleasant option, but the only one available nonetheless. As he strode through the streets and entered the beach area with Tom in an all-out run just behind, people started to take notice, turn and stare.

The fact that Tom was opening up the waterworks didn't help. Mark imagined what it would look like to see a grown man dressed only in underwear half-dragging a cute, crying little boy with a comically oversized shirt through the streets. They needed to get somewhere safe before he was arrested.

"I don' understand," Tom said through a sniff. "How'd it happen? What'd you do?"

"Look, I don't know, but I want to get to a restroom or something," Mark said. "You need some clothes."

Looking across the two-metre-high stone wall blocking the streets from the beach, he spotted a public toilet. "There."

Tom still had no idea what was going on. He managed to gather from his new perspective, the pitch of his voice and Mark's previous predicament, that he was young. Very young. A helpless child with a smooth, hairless face and the big frightened eyes to match. Lost in a world of adults. Without Mark he wouldn't last a second, so his little body clung to an instinct of survival and held on as they hurried towards the restrooms.

If the crowd thought Mark and young Tom had been a strange sight to be, they weren't ready for the stereotypically dressed scientist who came bolting after them, wheeling his mechanism along as best he could.

* * *

Mark got his first dash of luck outside the changing rooms. The pair of boy's pants lying draped against a pole were a little big, but they'd at least fit Tom better. He checked to ensure no one was watching (most eyes were trained on the latest spectacle to hit the street) and swiped them, ushering the child with him into the restrooms.

As humiliating as it was for Tom's previously attractive form to be able to fit into these kid's pants, he was glad that at least he wasn't wearing the giant shirt now lying discarded beside him. Finally pausing for a rest, he even got to examine the situation. It was bizarre - almost amusing - to note just how small he'd become. His bare chest led down to a cute pair of jeans and feet fresh from running in the sand. To anyone else he looked like a typical five-year-old kid enjoying a day at the beach.

What if, unlike Mark, he was stuck like this?

Tom couldn't bare the thought. The idea of losing his maturity, charm and history all in one fell swoop, trading it for this adorable little five-year-old's body with nothing to attract but the smiles of much older women, was too much.

Beside him, Mark had finished putting on Tom's clothes. "You okay?" There didn't seem to be anyone else to hear them.

Tom felt the intolerable tears produced from a body longing for any form of conflict coming on again. "I'm scared, Mark."

"Listen," he replied, "it's okay. Same thing happened to me and it just wore off after five minutes. You'll be fine."

"But it's been five minutes!" Tom surprised himself with the desperate whining sound of his new voice. "What if I don't change back?"

Mark didn't have a whole lot to say to that and in the end, didn't have to say anything. Outside they heard someone panting, and a huge computer device rolled on out, followed by a balding, fat man in a dirty lab coat.
112211.title: Generosity Is The Best Defense

1122111.content:
"Who are you?" asked Marcus. He exchanged a look with Tom. This balding, overweight man in a dirty old lab coat's appearance seemed to bring more sense into the situation. His appearance so soon after Tom and Marcus had entered the restroom couldn't be a coincidence.

"What?" asked the Doctor, "oh, you mean me. Yes, I'll explain that in a moment. First things first, however." This weird man had some sort of bulky contraption that looked like a plastic x-ray machine from the '60s... on wheels. He aimed the machine at Tom and then fiddled with some dials before a bright light emitted from the machine. Marcus didn't feel the now familiar pins and needles sensation he'd felt before both growing down and growing up, so he sighed a bit in relief. He did, however, take note of Tom, who had now obviously been the target of this odd device.

Tom already looked 7 or 8 now, a massive grin growing ever wider as he grew. His pants were terribly high watered as he'd already grown a number of inches in height. He took on a leaner, longer appearance as he approached ten years old. His legs and arms were longer, thinner, and a bit lanky. Baby fat disappeared entirely as he grew. His face grew longer, more defined, and less chubby. His pants must've been incredibly uncomfortable and they started to rip, unable to take Tom's growing legs and hips. They began ripping at the seams and Tom, now about 11, was blushing at this altercation. He tried to hold up the tattered ruined pants over his private parts as the pants ripped off. Twelve year old Tom was beginning to enter puberty. Skinny, long arms, legs, and chest all continued to grow, his height inching upward a bit faster. Soon he was about 14, his voice would start cracking and get deeper if he spoke. Light fuzz was beginning to appear on the growing teenager's lip and then chin. He was beginning to fill out and by 16 was budding quite a physique. His fuzz turned to proper stubble, getting longer and thicker as he aged. He continued to grow taller more slowly now and grew more muscular as he did. Soon he was back at 20 years old, where he'd started. He was Marcus's height once more, or thereabouts, and he had a strong, muscular body to rival his co-worker. His short, moderately thick beard was back to the way it was, a source of some jealous to Marcus.

Tom looked around, holding onto the shattered ruins of the pants that had once fit his much smaller self a matter of minutes ago. He looked at the crazy man who'd done this accusingly. "Who are you?" he asked, his voice returned to it's proper grown man's baritone.

"Here," said Doctor Augustus. He tossed the two men the various clothing each had dropped, humorously giving Marcus the rest of Tom's clothes and Tom the rest of Marcus's clothes. "You dropped these," he said, taking a moment to wipe his bald head of sweat. "Go and change and I'll explain."

The two 20-year-olds sighed and went into two adjacent bathroom stalls. They tossed each other their proper clothing, Tom had to deal with the fact that Marcus had worn his clothes. "My name is Doctor Augustus," said the Doctor to the two young men, "you both have just taken part in an experiment of my latest creation, a device capable of aging or de-aging the subject at will. I... uh... haven't come up with a name for it quite yet. I'm pleased to say that it works well, however."

"So you decided to test this thing out on two unsuspecting, innocent young men on the street not even knowing if it worked or not?" asked Marcus. He came out of the stall, fully dressed in his previous wardrobe, and outraged. "You could've left us as freaking kindergarteners! You monster!" He started coming towards the Doctor.

Doctor Augustus held the machine between him and Marcus, "Don't take that tone with me, young man," he said, "or you'll be in diapers before your friend there gets fully dressed in the stall. I did what was necessary to further science. Aren't you glad you didn't get stuck at 5 years old?"

Marcus eyed the old fart angrily. Tom got out of the other stall and faced the Doctor. Doctor Augustus continued, "I was going to reward the two of you for your trouble, if you like."

"With what?" asked Marcus.

"My machine, of course. Is there any requested age you'd want to be, either older or younger, that my machine can make you?" asked the Doctor.

"No thanks," said Tom, "I want no part in this crap any more. Let me out of here."

"Just a minute," said the Doctor, aiming the device at Tom, who gulped at the thought of being any younger than he was now again.

Marcus had been looking at himself in the mirror. He liked his big, muscular self... but that stubble. It still wasn't growing out a lot. He couldn't grow a decent beard yet, even at 20 years old, which made him jealous of his co-worker. He reckoned he wasn't even done growing yet, either. "Well, Doc... I'd like to be a little more mature, if you don't mind. Unlike last time, I think I might volunteer for a little aging."

The Doctor, eager to see his device at work once more, was delighted, "Very well, my boy! Just stand there, like that."

"I want no part in this, scoot over, Doc," said Tom, positioning himself behind the Doctor so there wouldn't be a possible way for him to get hit by the infernal contraption.
1122111.title: Generosity Can Save One's Bottom

choices: He wants to see himself at 35.
It's a bit much for him, he wants to be 20 again.
11221111.content: The beam hit Marcus once more and he felt the usual pins and needles feel again. He felt his body stretch and grow in more subtle ways now. He was still getting bigger, though. His muscles swelled a moderate bit as he matured through his twenties. His stubble grew thicker and longer until it was a full short beard like Tom's. He got a decent bit taller too, surprising himself by gaining 3 or 4 inches in height. At last he stood before the mirror at 27 years old. His pecs and biceps made his shirt seem a little small. His jeans were a little tight and small and his sandals looked a bit too small for his feet. He was stronger and more mature now than he was at 20.
11221111.title: Experiment One: Trial Three

choices: He wants to be even older
He decides that's enough and to be changed back to 20
112211111.content:
"This is cool, Doc," said Marcus, his voice a little deeper and more mature, "can you keep going?"

"Really, Marcus? Really?" asked Tom, wanting to leave.

"You're just jealous," laughed Marcus.

"Certainly, I can make you older still, Marcus," said the Doctor, aiming his machine again.

And again the light hit Marcus. He couldn't decide if he was beginning to enjoy the pin and needle sensation on his body or not. He didn't have much time to ponder, however, as he felt himself mature. It wasn't the drastic feeling of growing upwards from a little boy through puberty until 20, but the subtleties were just as apparent. At 35 he stopped. He seemed a little more muscular and didn't yet show any signs of aging. His beard was a bit thicker. Marcus seemed to have a feel about him, he felt like a mature grown man, not quite so young any more. It was fascinating to see what was in store for Marcus in 15 years. He realized he wouldn't quite let himself go and would be just as much the hunk in 15 years as he was now, if not more.
112211111.title: Experiment One continues...

choices: Marcus decides that that's enough, he wants to be young again
Marcus wants to be even older...
1122111111.content:
"Can you make me even older?" asked Marcus. His voice was a tad deeper even, taking on a tone that would be described as fatherly, calm.

"Marcus, what the hell are you doing?" asked Tom, "you've already lost 15 years of your life, dude!"

"C'mon, you can't blame my curiosity," said Marcus, "besides, I'll get most of it back in a minute. You gotta admit this is pretty damn awesome."

"I can age you further, Experiment One... I mean, Marcus... So sorry," Augustus blushed. He pushed a few dials and the beam hit Marcus another time.

Again, Marcus felt the strange sensation. He watched himself age in the mirror before his very eyes! As the years passed and Marcus became middle aged, he saw the first signs of aging on his face. His eyes started wrinkling with crow's feet just a bit, his face hardened a lot from his previously youthful smooth features. He was even starting to go grey. The grey hairs multiplied on his mustache. His temples were grey and spreading when he stopped. He was 45 now, but still a heavily muscular man. He was still well toned and his muscles were massive as ever. It seemed he wouldn't ever let himself go, despite growing old. He had to be one of the best looking middle aged men on Earth, he counted himself somewhat lucky that he'd spent most of his life (now at 45) as a handsome man, growing from a young innocent man to a mature, strong, wise looking fellow in the span of 25 years.
1122111111.title: Continue, Experiment One...

11221111111.content:
"Okay, that's enough," said Marcus, his voice deep, calm, and sounding identical to his father's. "It's good to know I'm not going to let myself go, but I'd really rather be younger again."

"You should think of yourself as lucky, Marcus," said Augustus, "I myself am 45 and I would kill to be in as good a shape as you are."

"And not bald either, I'd bet?" chuckled Marcus, still with a full head of hair.

"That's beyond my control," Augustus lamented, "for now, at least... Anyway, how much younger did you want to be?"
11221111111.title: Young again, please

choices: "Sure, I guess it's not so bad."
112211111112.content:
"25's fine," said Marcus.

"Very well," said Augustus.

Once more, Marcus felt the tingling sensation and he knew he was growing younger. The grey hair disappeared and he noticed only now that a little bit of a widow's peak had formed on his forehead as he put a hand through his hair. The hair that had slowly fallen out over 20 years was beginning to replenish itself. Marcus's face firmed up a bit, wrinkles disappeared. His heavy set middle aged features loosened a bit and he took on a younger appearance in the face. At last, he was 25, 5 years older than he was before. He still was a few inches taller than himself at 20, quite a bit more muscular, his voice a little deeper, a nice full beard on his chin and neck. He was a matured, grown man, but a young man. He was pleased with this.

"So, Tom," said Marcus, "you want to try the Doc's machine?"
112211111112.title: 25 year old Marcus

choices: He will now try it on himself
He'll look for someone else to try it on
1122111111121.content:
"No thank you," said Tom finally. He turned to Doctor Augustus, "Will you let us go now?"

Augustus sighed, "Fine, have it your way now."

"You're lucky we don't go to the police with what you've done to us!" cried Tom.

"At least I've been kind, haven't I?" asked the Doctor.

"Kind?!" cried Tom, "you experimented on us against our will! You turned me into a little boy all for stopping to help a crying little boy who happened to be my co-worker who'd been turned into a little boy himself not more than a moment before! I call that torture, you mad scientist!"

"Please," said the Doctor, "if I were only out to hurt you I would've left the both of you as crying babies in the middle of the road, hoping that a truck might run you over. Look at you, you're fine, back to your 20 year old self. That's generous, in my book."

"Look, Tom," said Marcus, the now older man approaching his co-worker, "let's just go. We got to be a kid again for a moment and then were changed back and now we're all the wiser for it. I know my girlfriend's going to love the older me," he chuckled.

Tom sighed, "Let's just get away from here," he said. He left the restroom at that with not so much as a goodbye.

"Thanks, Doc," said Marcus, "for everything." He shook the Doctor's hand, "Don't mind Tom..."

"Not to worry, my boy," said the Doctor. He examined his first experiment carefully, "will you be alright?"

"Me?" asked Marcus, "I'm fine. Don't worry, I can still say I'm 20, right? It's only a 5 year difference, no problem."

"Very well then, have fun," said the Doctor.

"Bye, Doc," said Marcus. He walked out of the restroom, once again feeling on top of the world with his now bigger, stronger self.

The Doctor sighed with relief. "Finally those fools are out of my hair," he said out loud to himself. He chuckled, "Oh yes, very funny, Augustus." He felt his bald scalp. He sighed again, "Well, now that I know this works..."
1122111111121.title: Tom and Marcus take their leave

11221111111211.content:
Doctor Augustus looked at himself in the mirror. At 45 he looked much older. "Well, time to give myself a break now, hmmm?" he said to himself. He turned the machine on himself and zapped. He felt the sensation he'd only witnessed in other people prior. The hair on his head repopulated his scalp. His mustache hairs grew brown once more and grey also faded from his head. Wrinkles diminished as the Doctor took note that his big, portly stomach began to deflate. He was in his 30's once more. The bald spot on his head was getting smaller and smaller. His mustache grew shorter. His muscles grew firmer as his fat grew sparse.

He was in his 20's again. His head was full of hair again, his mustache becoming short. He was once again skinny, no ounce of flab penetrated him as he grew younger into his early twenties.
